actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-489.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of March 2, 1931, to provide that certain proceedings of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Inc., shall be printed as a House document.

summary.text: Provides that the proceedings of the national encampments of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Incorporated shall be printed as a document of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of March 2, 1931, to provide that certain proceedings of the Italian American War Veterans of the United States, Inc., shall be printed as a House document.
